## Part 1: Process the data

```{r}

buzzfeed <- read_csv("buzzfeed.csv")


names(buzzfeed) <- c("title", "text", "url","authors","source","type" )
head(buzzfeed)

```

```{r}
library(tidytext)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ngram)

buzzfeed%>%
  mutate(title_length=wordcount(title))

tidy_buzzfeed<- buzzfeed%>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)



tidy_buzzfeed1<- buzzfeed%>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)%>%
  mutate(word = str_extract(word, "[a-z']+")) 



buzzfeed_sentiment <- tidy_buzzfeed %>%
  inner_join(get_sentiments("bing")) %>%
  inner_join(get_sentiments("nrc")) %>%
  inner_join(get_sentiments("afinn")) 
```
